General.Name: Enterprise Metals Ltd
General.Description: Enterprise Metals Limited engages in the exploration of mineral properties. The company explores for copper, gold, nickel, zinc, iron ore, lithium, and base metal tenements. Its primary projects include Murchison, Doolgunna, and Fraser Range projects located in Western Australia. The company was formerly known as Revere Mining Limited and changed its name to Enterprise Metals Limited in December 2008. Enterprise Metals Limited was incorporated in 2007 and is based in West Perth, Australia.
General.Address: 7 Ventnor Avenue, West Perth, WA, Australia, 6005
